title: Divine Ruby & Diamond Bridal Haaram - Devatha Deepthi Collection
materials: adorned with meticulously set Brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
E-F Color). Features a central Ruby (approx. 2 carats) with excellent color saturation and luster
further enhanced with lustrous South Sea Pearls. Features a premium Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Exquisite floral and paisley-inspired design, a timeless motif cherished in South Indian heritage. The necklace showcases intricate openwork with brilliant diamonds in a pave setting. The centerpiece includes a radiant ruby surrounded by floral arrangements. Dangles of South Sea Pearls add to its ethereal beauty. The overall design embodies the 'Addigai' style with modern sensibilities.
colors: Primarily Yellow Gold with dazzling White Diamonds
complemented by the intense Red of the Ruby and the iridescent White of the South Sea Pearls.
occasions: and grand celebrations. An ideal heirloom piece for Seemantham or any traditional Telugu ceremony.
description: This Haaram is more than just jewelry; it is an investment in artistry and heritage. The exceptional craftsmanship, combined with the brilliance of diamonds and the captivating ruby, makes it a true statement piece. The use of South Sea Pearls adds an element of sophistication and grace, elevating the design. Experience the luxury of owning a piece that blends tradition with timeless elegance, making it a treasured family heirloom for generations to come. A perfect embodiment of 'Lakshmi Kasula Haaram' essence, radiating prosperity and grace.
